Package index

Analysis

Summary Functions

Group and summarise for chosen metric

lfs_summarise_hours() experimental
Group by and Summarise for hours worked
lfs_summarise_salary()
Group by and Summarise into salary ONS Salary
lfs_summarise_unemployment()
Group by and Summarise for ONS unemployment
lfs_summarise_union() experimental
Group by and Summarise for unionisation rates

Flags

Add a indicator column

lfs_flag_graduate()
Add a graduate flag column to LFS data
lfs_flag_graduate_ons()
Add an ONS graduate flag column to LFS data
lfs_flag_postgraduate()
Add a post-gradaute flag column to LFS data
lfs_flag_teacher()
Add a teacher flag column to LFS data

Setup

Convert and Compile

Convert from .sav to .Rds and compile to one dataset

lfs_convert()
Convert files to Rds for faster compiling in future
lfs_compile()
Compile to single data.frame
lfs_load()
Load LFS Data
aps_load()
Load APS Data

Add custom columns

Brings in extra columns from lfs

pick_var()
Picks column names in order of appearance
